column3: “I ate dirt because I thought my breath smelled of weed in public. Yeah, I was that high.”

“Shishkaberry is a fusion of Blueberry and Afghani...  One of the most well known, hybrid strains to date!  I believe it's the most beautiful strain I've ever seen.  This strain is packed with multi colored leaves and hairs from purple and blue to pink and orange.  The smell is unlike any other...  A blast of tangy fruit and fresh roses.  The taste is very earthy and leaves you with a rather pleasant after taste =) Sh...”

“After a few weeks with access to only Girl Scout Cookie and Jack Herer as a medical/recreational user, my tolerance was up (and really, sativas aren't the best for me anyway).  

Last night I got my hands on some perfectly cured Shishkaberry.  One hit and ten minutes (I think?  Time kinda ... smooshed? :p) later I was having to pry my eyes open with my fingers then force myself to type what I hope was a coherent mess...”

“really like this strain, one of my favorite of the many berry strains out there and of DJ shorts in particular. very nice fruity, almost grape berry flavor with a slight skunk hash hint if flavor. usually pick up if it is a good batch I'm very picky what u get at dispensary's since I grow my own also, but this is one I get when it's good. very relaxing and calming effect both in mind and body, very good all-round str...”

“This strain is advertised as 80/20 Indica dominant, but it seems to be closer to 50/50. Sativas tend to make me a bit nervous and shaky especially when I'm alone, so I prefer to medicate with mild Indicas later in the evening.

This Shiskaberry, from Fweedom co-op, looks and smells a lot like the popular B.C. Bud" smuggled across the Canadian border during the 1990's. There must have been additional Sativa genetic...”"

“Migraine pain 6; nausea 9 when I medicated round 2100 or so. Takes bout 10 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (an absolute must for me). Body high a lil heavier than I remembered but still very nice! Head high knocked my @## out, oops! Don't think my hubby was planning on that, lol! Still highly recommend for nighttime/bedtime use for pain/nausea/anxiety!”

“Shishkaberry smells incredibly sweet and florally all through veg. her aromaticness only intensifies in flower. the high has as much to offer as the flavor and smell. peaceful, yet, cerebrally stimulating and madly relaxing. fading into a sound and solid sleep is no sweat when the high begins to wear away. the potency is second to none, so use real caution when cooking and baking with her. I would highly recommend Sh...”
“Just found this and it is phenomenal new favorite! Great to smoke finish the dishes then hit the couch for some serious couch surfing. I you can find if you will covet it.”
“Just found this and it is phenomenal new favorite! Great to smoke finish the dishes then hit the couch for some serious couch surfing. I you can find if you will covet it.”

“Smell is amazing . Gives off such an earthy smell. Yet so sweet. The colors definitely come in right for the greenery it brings. I found this little buddy in Collective Efforts in Sacramento. One of the Berner cookie franchises. Testing the smoke-ability out now. First hit....brings a misty cloudy haze. Bringing me to a fruity taste. My endorphins for happiness just set off. Second hit....eased a pain I was feeling i...”
“This flower is very tasty! I am very impressed with this lady. Very spacy feeling with all anxiety and stress melted away. Typical couch lock for an Indica.. but that should be expected!”

“An amazing strain up there in the highest echelons. Excellent hybrid with great head high with terrific observational/perceptive enhancement as well as a nice warm body buzz which will leave you relaxed and comfortable. Recommended enthusiastically.”

“Tonite after a 3 hour walk/hike looking for Pokemon at Mt. Tabor I’m winding down with Shishkaberry. This is the strongest indica I’ve used to date! Mine tested at 24.94% THC and .04% CBD. This one truly makes you feel “stoned” as opposed to “high”. My head feels heavy and my eyes feel puffy and red just like all the stoner cartoons, and I’m very relaxed. I used this briefly twice and it put me to sleep both times.

...”

“My new favorite! I've never felt so comfy before. Pain is eased (it's never GONE). I'm able to curl up with a blanket a bowl and a just enjoy having my body relax. Couch lock is almost immediate, and my eyelids droop down as my mouth lifts in a smile. I feel like I could lose myself in tunes for hours. Actually, that's a good idea...🎶”

“Interesting strain. A complex blend of indica/sativa qualities. The sample I have is medium green with dark red hairs everywhere. The bud is very tightly packed with every surface coated in resin. The taste is earthy with a purple undertone. The effects start within three minutes with slight sativa spaciness, but also an indica body tug. My nausea was complexly resolved but this strain had a low munchie factor for me...”

“When I got this I opened the package and it smelled great.Like berries and stuff.I rolled one up and and tried it out.At first I didn't think it was that good but HELLO,its a creeper :) It hits yah pretty good but not and overwhelming buzz.”

“This knocks me right out. Pain, caring about stuff, depression, anxiety -- all of it goes away because this is a one-way ticket to LaLaLand. Smooth and tasty smoke and then a lovely sleep. Very dreamy.”
“Easily one of my faves. It's the kind of weed that makes you blissfully forgetful. Not a care in the world.”
“lovely aroma and flavor for a enjoyable smoke..and the effects are wonderful after days of mountain hiking to take away aches and pains..and happy head high to keep me going. thumbs up.”

“Shiskaberry ia an Indica dominant hybrid that has a sweet and earthy flavour and smell.  One of the medical issues I have is insomnia, so this strain not only tasted delicious, but it also helped me fall asleep and sleep well.   When the high first hit me it really mellowed out my mood, allowing me to feel less anxious so I could actually relax.  Once the relaxation hit in, it only took about 30 minutes for me to be ...”
“This strain is awesome for ADHD and anxiety for the first little while, and then it tapers down into a nice indica classic couchlock. 10/10”

“Just found this again it's so bloody hard do get. Can't say enough good things. Wow! Pain relief was sublime and muscles relaxed like a silk sheet unfolding. If you can find it but it up. I've asked why not more of this platinum strain and apparently greedy growers won't part with the seeds lol!”

“Shishkaberry is listed as an indica and I agree with that, with a THC of 23%. Preroll smoked well.

The high was a nice mellow that I usually get from strains with blueberry in them and also a nice amount of pain relief for me. Its made me want to take a nap.

Taste is like sweet berry or a slight blueberry which is pretty spot on for the strain.”
“Got some low grade from a seattle dispensary and it was gas.  Ounce for 89$ and one of the best tasting buds I have ever tired.”

“Shishkaberry is listed as an indica and I agree with that, with a THC of 23%. Preroll smoked well.

The high was a nice mellow that I usually get from strains with blueberry in them and also a nice amount of pain relief for me. Its made me want to take a nap.

Taste is like sweet berry or a slight blueberry which is pretty spot on for the strain.”
“good strain...definitely good for a sleep aid, not great if you have a lot of things to get done.”
“Got some low grade from a seattle dispensary and it was gas.  Ounce for 89$ and one of the best tasting buds I have ever tired.”
“lovely aroma and flavor for a enjoyable smoke..and the effects are wonderful after days of mountain hiking to take away aches and pains..and happy head high to keep me going. thumbs up.”
“It made me fidgety and overly aware of my glasses and the size of my hands.”
“Just some really nice medicine. It helped me quite a bit and no negative side effects for me.”

“This was my favorite until recently, still cant fault it but kings kush just took the prize. Relaxing, stress melting, peace and contentment with pain relief and a borderline couch locker i find right after smoking i can get stuff done but it sets in after 20 mins or so and you shouldnt plan anything but relaxing.”
“I got the redecan version from ocs.ca, and it's not anything to write home about. It lasted an hour or two, and I was just... high. I don't know, it just wasn't for me I guess.”

“I am a daily smoker, 1-2 blunts a day. This strain had me mellow and Smiling, you definitely feel relaxed & motivated (ie I happily cleaned my entire house) ..this strain is for calming a restless mind, yet focused”

“One of the best strains on earth.  Imagine all the best, different feelings weed can give you.  Now Imagine they come on one after the other after the other.  Its like a perfect strain.  I grab as much as I can whenever I see it on the shelves.”
“Chill”
“great strain, was alittle expensive but well worth the price.  somewhat of a couchlock but a happy pleasant type indica buzzzz.”

“review for shishkaberry in BHO crumble. obtained from Urban Wellness in Albuquerque NM. tested at state limit of 70% and no other tests available on the package. got for $25 a half gram. tastes very fruity and very much like the flower form. was of very high quality on consistency and color, was a little darker than most but it taste wonderful. another awesome job elevated and Urban Wellness. very nice well rounded h...”

“I've had this strain before and really wasn't impressed then, until my Indica go-to employee at the Sacred Herb 🤘dispensary recommended it. Bought a gram after a steady GG#4, Girl Scout Cookie, and Kosher Kush run upon her advice and am glad I did. It was a nice change and even mixes well with the others for different times :) ...this Kish I bought is maybe slightly different in strain, a better harvest, or ??? but ...”
“Tastes amazing strong Indica high at end but uplifting at first very good strain for medical and recreational use”
“Love this strain. It's my go-to for clubbing and gaming.”

“I am a daily smoker, 1-2 blunts a day. This strain had me mellow and Smiling, you definitely feel relaxed & motivated (ie I happily cleaned my entire house) ..this strain is for calming a restless mind, yet focused”
“great strain, was alittle expensive but well worth the price.  somewhat of a couchlock but a happy pleasant type indica buzzzz.”
“Tastes amazing strong Indica high at end but uplifting at first very good strain for medical and recreational use”

“review for shishkaberry in BHO crumble. obtained from Urban Wellness in Albuquerque NM. tested at state limit of 70% and no other tests available on the package. got for $25 a half gram. tastes very fruity and very much like the flower form. was of very high quality on consistency and color, was a little darker than most but it taste wonderful. another awesome job elevated and Urban Wellness. very nice well rounded h...”
“Gives me a nice mellow feeling.  That feeling where you are just nodding your head like, Mmm
column4: yes indeed." Makes me sleepy and possibly horny too. But when you're sleepy and horny and go to bed to take care of business you more often than not wind up just sleeping. So this sort of doesn't work for me.

column1: Does help treat anxiety in my experience.”"

column3: “Love this strain. It's my go-to for clubbing and gaming.”
“Smells sweet, tastes sweet. got a hint of hash. Strong but not as strong as I was hoping. A good smoke! .... ok it crept up on me, it is very strong :)”
“in respect to my dealing with anxiety the strain is highly effective”
“Tastes amazing strong Indica high at end but uplifting at first very good strain for medical and recreational use”
“Gives me a nice mellow feeling.  That feeling where you are just nodding your head like, Mmm
column4: yes indeed." Makes me sleepy and possibly horny too. But when you're sleepy and horny and go to bed to take care of business you more often than not wind up just sleeping. So this sort of doesn't work for me.

column1: Does help treat anxiety in my experience.”"

column3: “Smells sweet, tastes sweet. got a hint of hash. Strong but not as strong as I was hoping. A good smoke! .... ok it crept up on me, it is very strong :)”

“One of the best strains on earth.  Imagine all the best, different feelings weed can give you.  Now Imagine they come on one after the other after the other.  Its like a perfect strain.  I grab as much as I can whenever I see it on the shelves.”
“If you're the kind of person who has one or two small bowls many times throughout the day, this one packs a pretty good punch and has a nice second phase. Recommend.”
“Muy dulce y afrutada con un sabor muy similar al aroma que recuerda a bayas, el efecto es ligero y llevadero sin hacerse muy pesado”
“Great strain if you need a little pain relief also helped my stomach a little bit when I had the flu and needed to eat.”

“review for shishkaberry in BHO crumble. obtained from Urban Wellness in Albuquerque NM. tested at state limit of 70% and no other tests available on the package. got for $25 a half gram. tastes very fruity and very much like the flower form. was of very high quality on consistency and color, was a little darker than most but it taste wonderful. another awesome job elevated and Urban Wellness. very nice well rounded h...”
“Great strain if you need a little pain relief also helped my stomach a little bit when I had the flu and needed to eat.”
“great strain, was alittle expensive but well worth the price.  somewhat of a couchlock but a happy pleasant type indica buzzzz.”
“Smells sweet, tastes sweet. got a hint of hash. Strong but not as strong as I was hoping. A good smoke! .... ok it crept up on me, it is very strong :)”
“This is atm my favourite strain. It's the only strain that's kept me focused on studying through finals. The smell and taste is also amazing.”
“Shishkaberry is a great one for Indica fans.  Also got some awesome Shishkaberry wax.  Great for sleepy time medicating.  Love all the strains with the blueberry influence.”

“Fweedom Collective in Seattle has some beautiful buds of this strain. They definitely have the REAL Shishkaberry strain and they definitely grow it properly and, thus, get the best attributes from it. The aroma is out of this world. It's covered in trichomes and it smells like concentrated dark berries of some kind. I'm rating the Fweedom Collective version a 9. Those guys are perfectionists.”

“i smoked a 1/10 of a gram like 10 minutes ago, since yesterday im suffering with a heavy muscle pain in my forearm, this helped, but didnt take all the pain, um having a little bit of headache, but the high os very Nice, i feel like diving heavy in my bed”

“The shiska is a knockout kind of strain that will have u mellow and sleeping before long. Great evening strain to unwind after work. Most indicas do not make me that tired but the shiskaberry sure did and also has helped with migraine headaches as well, great all around indica for pain relief and a great night sleep”

“Taken off guard by how good this weed is. Lots of frost, crystals galore! Strong aroma of blueberries. Amazing taste. Instantly registered the head change. Was left with pleasant taste in my mouth after exhaling. This one is definitely worth getting if you can!”
“great strain just a little heavy headed.”
“Bought the Seven Oaks brand from the OCS and it was great. Super euphoric high with a great aroma. Highly recommended.”
“Tasted amazing and had a very crisp" head change.”"
“Didn't want to break up the buds coz they're so fresh - but had to smoke it.  awesome.  period.”

“Picked up a Select Elite 1g cart from Hi Cascade in Astoria Ore. I'm a daily smoker so I have a tolerance. That being said. The taste is great if you're a berry lover. The overall effects were mild. Mostly just made me hungry at first. A little talkative and then relaxed. Not bad. 1 blunt up!”
“Tastes like a blueberry straight up.”

“talkative af
get super high”

“It's great for managing pain about the house, would not recommend trying to do anything requiring exertion post smoking this strain as it's got a hella potent couch lock.

Also the taste notes LIE, It's literally tasting of Guinness stout with Ribena mixed in, no complaints, it's a tasty strain, but don't LIE about flavour profiles leafly kthnx”
“Happy/giggly for about an hour then get hit with sleepiness. Overall good strain to have before heading to bed.”
“Good shit,good taste,good high and good times smoking this kush<3”
“literally the smoothest strain I have ever had in my life! I got uplifted and a good body buzz, very social strain and I recommend it to all.”

“I’m not an indica person but holy shit...I smoked this in the middle of the night and I’ve never been that high (keep in mind I’m experienced), i felt like i was on another planet. Super good for socializing though !”

“Loved it was in hospital for 3 days didnt smoke .got released yesterday an
smoked some 
I'm an average 1-2 blunt smoker daily ..I had such a head high that lasted hours then indica kicked in helped my axienty pain depression .defiantly will buy again”
“Mixed this up in a bowl with other strains, so we didn't get the full effect.  It made all of us very giggly, super relaxed and sleepy.  The nugs are pretty and flavorful”

“It's mild potency wise from most growers, but the taste is amazing, the effects come on really fast so no creeper surprises and really chill but talkative effects.
I mean, this is just a great all round go to for a small social gathering.  I plan on keeping on hand for exactly that, and as a gentle intro for anyone new who wants to try with me.”

“this is the only strain that has made me couch locked in a lonng time and I've have many indicas, most just are relaxing but after the initial rush is gone the couch locking feels like a nice weight on your body. my favorite strain”

“When I tried this strain it was in a co2 cartridge. I loved the wonderful taste . It as been one of my all time favorites . I still haven't had a chance to try it in flower form. I know that when I do I will most definitely enjoy that moment. It took care of relaxing my muscles, which allowed my bone pain to lighten up and get the relief I so desperately need. I love this strain. I would love to learn to grow. This w...”

“it would be a lot better if it didn't make me eat up everything in my house XD. other tha. that, wonderful strain with a beautiful aroma, but I wouldn't recommend it if you're trying to lose weight because this will make you EAT.”

“This strain was amazing, I got it from the OCS and unfortunately it did take quiet a while to arrive due to a postal strike, however when It did arrive, It was worth the wait, pairs very well with blackberry brandy papers due to the berry undertones of the weed and by far an amazing rate of activation, perfect mix of energy and exemplary couch lock when needed, while it doesn't melt away the pain, it does make it nig...”

“TASTE TASTE TASTE! Oh my goodness what a taste. Such a profound impact on the taste buds. I don't think you could hit the nail on the head any better than this strain here. I got a 7g bottle from the NSLC for 62$. After having tried just one gram and falling in love with the Berry Bonanza that happens in your airways after taking a drag or rip of this sweet, earthy, dank, smelling flower. The profile of the flower is...”

“Release tension and stress; flow along, leaving your worries behind. I vaped this out of a sample pack with a friend who is also experienced and it blew our minds. Like wow! Grass never makes me giggly, but this did! carefree, uplifting, great for socializing. It's honestly, one of the best strains I've tried.”
“I am relaxed, tingly and aroused. This strain made me aware of every tiny sensation on my skin.”
“Not really into sweet strains but I like this one quite a bit. Nice change from kush. Really balanced mind and body high.”

“it would be a lot better if it didn't make me eat up everything in my house XD. other tha. that, wonderful strain with a beautiful aroma, but I wouldn't recommend it if you're trying to lose weight because this will make you EAT.”

“This strain was amazing, I got it from the OCS and unfortunately it did take quiet a while to arrive due to a postal strike, however when It did arrive, It was worth the wait, pairs very well with blackberry brandy papers due to the berry undertones of the weed and by far an amazing rate of activation, perfect mix of energy and exemplary couch lock when needed, while it doesn't melt away the pain, it does make it nig...”
“Tastes great but it does make me cough, so caution is advised when vaping.”
“This has become one of my favourite strains. The high felt like a sativa ij the beginning and it ended with a couch lock but i was still able to do activities. Really potent if growed correctly.”
“Shishkaberry tastes & smells SO GOOD! So. Good. Really relaxed & heavy--perfect for nighttime. Also mixed this with Blue Dream and it's freaking wonderful.”

“Release tension and stress; flow along, leaving your worries behind. I vaped this out of a sample pack with a friend who is also experienced and it blew our minds. Like wow! Grass never makes me giggly, but this did! carefree, uplifting, great for socializing. It's honestly, one of the best strains I've tried.”
“I am relaxed, tingly and aroused. This strain made me aware of every tiny sensation on my skin.”

Grass never makes me giggly, but this did! carefree, uplifting, great for socializing. It's honestly, one of the best strains I've tried.”

“Seriously one of the best flowers I've ever encountered! Erases nausea & intense migraines for me better than any over-the-counter drug can and I really appreciated that. Shishkaberry really smells incredible too. It's really sweet and the berry comes across heavily. 

I would recommend this strain to anyone dealing with sinus pressure related migraines and GI related nausea.”
“All time favorite! Powerful berry flavor and potent effects. Nice head high with waves of laziness. I found myself oozing into the couch while I took deep calming breaths of relaxation.”
“I High-ly recomend this;) The taste is just so fruity and the high is awesome (Really good for pain)”
“I am relaxed, tingly and aroused. This strain made me aware of every tiny sensation on my skin.”
“lovely taste me mm my husband enjoyed it..relieves the stress..”
“Nice day time strain little euphoric as well.. Has a nice berry smell to it and burns smooth”
“Solid strain. Good for smoking when you have no plans for the rest of the day, because it kept me high for HOURS.”
“I am relaxed, tingly and aroused. This strain made me aware of every tiny sensation on my skin.”
“great taste, great high”

“This strain is a tasty and potent one that has a similar texture ans breakage factor like the popular Blue Dream. Very keefy buds leave raw hash crystals that can be sprinkled on the bowl of this berry flavored treat. One of my favs for sure.”
“Got me pleasant.”
“lovely taste me mm my husband enjoyed it..relieves the stress..”
“Great taste and mellow body high. Very nice stuff :)”

“Release tension and stress; flow along, leaving your worries behind. I vaped this out of a sample pack with a friend who is also experienced and it blew our minds. Like wow! Grass never makes me giggly, but this did! carefree, uplifting, great for socializing. It's honestly, one of the best strains I've tried.”
“Strong taste of berries and candy. Unreal. Although I though it takes quite a few puffs before it takes effect. The hit is pretty good though. No headaches, not stoned in social settings.”
“I am relaxed, tingly and aroused. This strain made me aware of every tiny sensation on my skin.”
“smooth head mellow body”
“great flower  would get it again next time good for day time”
“relaxed happy high💆”
“lovely taste me mm my husband enjoyed it..relieves the stress..”
“Great taste and mellow body high. Very nice stuff :)”
“Love it sweet taste”
“Really relaxing weed that still lets you think about work and still keep you focused and productive. The body high really helps your headspace”
“Wonderful smell, has great taste, pretty good buzz”

“All around perfect for anything anytime anywhere big dense buds very frosty some purple for those ppl that need to have it. Smells nice taste great. High doesn't fog you when she leaves or while she is working. Didn't notice it do much for symptoms just a nice smooth smoke 💨 to enjoy.”

“For one of the more touted strains among cannabis users I know, I found this strain to be almost the opposite of what I expected for an indica dominant strain.  While two friends who medicated with me experienced profound short term memory loss and extreme appetite stimulation, I found the high to be very racy and up, with a very clear head and little to no appetite stimulation.  For me it was a very good daytime or ...”
“very nice indica strain...i was able to get it at 10 dollars a gram but it is definitely strong. i suggest grinding it up in a metal grinder because a lot of kief can be generated off the real bud.”

“My experience at Canna-Daddy’s with Shishaberry-Leafy has been excellent for maintaining my pain management.  I recently moved to Portland Oregon from Southern Oregon and arrived at Canna-Daddy’s” to be greeted with professionalism and great customer service.  The help was very conscientious about my needs and were extremely helpful when picking out appropriate Leafy products for my individual pain management.  Keep ...”
“Solid mix between sativa and indica. Great for starting a lazy day - or ending a long one. High originates in the head but leaves the whole body feeling warm.”
“Very potent. Excellent for relaxation, stress, anxiety and loss of appetite. Definitely one of my new favourites.”
“My favorite so far! Smooth, quick and very very nice. Uplifting. It made me talkative as hell...good for social anxiety.”
“this is a good motivation weed for me anyway”
“Not impressed.   A slight earthy flavor via vaping.   Very mild high.”

“Like anything else originating from this source, an amazing piece of cannabis. When done well from a true source this will kick your pattootie. It should be sticky, icky and like a sea of orange shag carpet.”
“Smooth burn on the vape”

“This strain is wonderful for the late afternoon to early evening, providing a sweet, fruity taste to its user. mindfulness overcomes you in this high, you are suddenly aware of how relaxed you feel, and how good everything seems in this moment right now. Ideal for those with depression and anxiety.

-Alicia”
“one of my favorites! very dope”
“This is a great aphrodisiac strain ;)”

“Migraine pain mild, nausea 8, anxiety outta control when I medicated round .. uh ... after work sometime. Takes bout 10 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (an absolute must for me). Body high allowed me to eat dinner. Head high super heavy. I fell fast asleep within 1 hour or so. Wudnt expectin that but good to know it's a good sleepy bud. I'd highly recommend for nighttime use for pain/nause...”

“Only had the opportunity to get this one time n since t source was new to me I thought the seller made up the name but after I smoked some I was floored. It's been three years since I've smoked it n I still hope my boy says he has it when he gives me the menu..it's kinda rare as well so if you see it buy it all n you'll thank me.i don't remember the exact type of high it gives but it was such an enjoyable feeling I g...”

“This is definitely one of my least-favorite strains.  It seems that more often than not, Kish gives me a borderline bad high.  It starts off very nice but after a while it takes me to some dark places in my head.  I spend more time trying to make myself chill and thus the high is ruined and I'm often left feeling like I have a bad taste left over in my brain.  It does smell great though!!”
“great indica strain... help relieve runner's knee pain and great for loss of appetite as well as insomnia. not for novice indica smokers”
“good strain...definitely good for a sleep aid, not great if you have a lot of things to get done.”
“Smokes nice with a nice berry flavour and a little taste of the Afghan strain. Effects include a nice head high and a relaxing body buzz.”
“I really enjoyed the mental openness and focus this one gave me. Really good for relaxing and working through thoughts.”
“This strain is great for anyone with insomnia or a lot of stress”

“became ine of my favorite strains almost instantly.
i have anxiety so this gives me a good balance of indica calmness with some sativa influence. the smell is amazing and the taste is just as yummy. highly recommended”

“Love love this strain! Kicks in quickly . I'm still able to go about my evening routine and ready for sleep when I'm done . If you sit too long you'll definetly get a bit of couch lock. On my fav list for sure.”

“Clear kush nose and aftertaste.  Great to enjoy with food! Superb bag appeal with dense and frosty nuggets.  

Onset is quick with present head change, anxiety melts away. Slight pressure in the back of the head to the nape of the neck, but not unpleasant. Clarity is remarkable: I feel focused and energized.  Definitely pick this up if for your medicine cabinet! ;)”
“amazing high perfect day time smoke doesn't weigh u down still able to get threw the day on this one”
“wonderful berry aroma with lots of crystaly nugs”

“When I opened the container I was punched in the face with a fruity smell. You definitely get the blueberry aroma from it. I was glued to my couch for a while after trying it. Helped with my appetite too which I really liked. It's one of the best shishkaberries I've had so far and will be going back for an ounce soon.”
“Very rare find good taste and stone highly recommended”

“My husband didn’t want to get this one at first. But boy are we glad we did. It smells so sweet and tastes a little funky but that’s alright because it really does make you feel relaxed. Knocked us out by 7 pm. FYI if you work early mornings don’t smoke this strain late in the day or you’ll over sleep.”
“Pretty good strain, tasty and hits you instantly”
“This has become one of my favourite strains. The high felt like a sativa ij the beginning and it ended with a couch lock but i was still able to do activities. Really potent if growed correctly.”
“Amazing strain”

“this is the only strain that has made me couch locked in a lonng time and I've have many indicas, most just are relaxing but after the initial rush is gone the couch locking feels like a nice weight on your body. my favorite strain”

“I found myself a bit anxious towards the beginning so next time I might mix with a bit of a high-CBD strain. My mind was blown by a documentary about Korea, I felt like I had a million thoughts and ideas and this would be a very good strain for intimacy with a partner. I only vaporized a small bit and it was very strong. Less one star for anxiety but all in all a great time!”

“It's mild potency wise from most growers, but the taste is amazing, the effects come on really fast so no creeper surprises and really chill but talkative effects.
I mean, this is just a great all round go to for a small social gathering.  I plan on keeping on hand for exactly that, and as a gentle intro for anyone new who wants to try with me.”
“Good shit,good taste,good high and good times smoking this kush<3”

“Picked up a Select Elite 1g cart from Hi Cascade in Astoria Ore. I'm a daily smoker so I have a tolerance. That being said. The taste is great if you're a berry lover. The overall effects were mild. Mostly just made me hungry at first. A little talkative and then relaxed. Not bad. 1 blunt up!”
“I love it, it's so flavorful. Great high as well”

“TASTE TASTE TASTE! Oh my goodness what a taste. Such a profound impact on the taste buds. I don't think you could hit the nail on the head any better than this strain here. I got a 7g bottle from the NSLC for 62$. After having tried just one gram and falling in love with the Berry Bonanza that happens in your airways after taking a drag or rip of this sweet, earthy, dank, smelling flower. The profile of the flower is...”

“When I tried this strain it was in a co2 cartridge. I loved the wonderful taste . It as been one of my all time favorites . I still haven't had a chance to try it in flower form. I know that when I do I will most definitely enjoy that moment. It took care of relaxing my muscles, which allowed my bone pain to lighten up and get the relief I so desperately need. I love this strain. I would love to learn to grow. This w...”
“Mixed this up in a bowl with other strains, so we didn't get the full effect.  It made all of us very giggly, super relaxed and sleepy.  The nugs are pretty and flavorful”
“Didn't want to break up the buds coz they're so fresh - but had to smoke it.  awesome.  period.”
“Bought the Seven Oaks brand from the OCS and it was great. Super euphoric high with a great aroma. Highly recommended.”

“got some beautiful looking buds. Not my favorite type of taste (earthy, not to strong though) but had a little bit of a sweet after taste to it too. I somehow managed to get a lot of homework done in a short amount of time after burning this... writing came naturally. Painted, then i crashed on the couch cuddled and watched reruns of my favorite daily shows before drifting off into stoned slumber. Very Nice, not knoc...”
“Shishkaberry made me oddly itchy all over. Great strain otherwise, but I couldn’t really enjoy it.”

“I purchased 3.5 grams of Redecans Shishkaberry, and I wasn't all that impressed. When I opened the package the only scent I could detect was earth, no berry to speak of. Provided a decent but unremarkable high. Expected more but was left wanting.”
“Great berry smell. Made me relaxed and happy.”
“I am relaxed, tingly and aroused. This strain made me aware of every tiny sensation on my skin.”

“This strain was amazing, I got it from the OCS and unfortunately it did take quiet a while to arrive due to a postal strike, however when It did arrive, It was worth the wait, pairs very well with blackberry brandy papers due to the berry undertones of the weed and by far an amazing rate of activation, perfect mix of energy and exemplary couch lock when needed, while it doesn't melt away the pain, it does make it nig...”

“Loved it was in hospital for 3 days didnt smoke .got released yesterday an
smoked some 
I'm an average 1-2 blunt smoker daily ..I had such a head high that lasted hours then indica kicked in helped my axienty pain depression .defiantly will buy again”

“I’m not an indica person but holy shit...I smoked this in the middle of the night and I’ve never been that high (keep in mind I’m experienced), i felt like i was on another planet. Super good for socializing though !”
“literally the smoothest strain I have ever had in my life! I got uplifted and a good body buzz, very social strain and I recommend it to all.”
“Happy/giggly for about an hour then get hit with sleepiness. Overall good strain to have before heading to bed.”

“It's great for managing pain about the house, would not recommend trying to do anything requiring exertion post smoking this strain as it's got a hella potent couch lock.

Also the taste notes LIE, It's literally tasting of Guinness stout with Ribena mixed in, no complaints, it's a tasty strain, but don't LIE about flavour profiles leafly kthnx”

“talkative af
get super high”
“Tastes like a blueberry straight up.”
“Tasted amazing and had a very crisp" head change.”"
“great strain just a little heavy headed.”

“Taken off guard by how good this weed is. Lots of frost, crystals galore! Strong aroma of blueberries. Amazing taste. Instantly registered the head change. Was left with pleasant taste in my mouth after exhaling. This one is definitely worth getting if you can!”

“The shiska is a knockout kind of strain that will have u mellow and sleeping before long. Great evening strain to unwind after work. Most indicas do not make me that tired but the shiskaberry sure did and also has helped with migraine headaches as well, great all around indica for pain relief and a great night sleep”

“i smoked a 1/10 of a gram like 10 minutes ago, since yesterday im suffering with a heavy muscle pain in my forearm, this helped, but didnt take all the pain, um having a little bit of headache, but the high os very Nice, i feel like diving heavy in my bed”
“Love the Buzz. Coach locked Happy High.”
“Makes you feel chilled and slightly sleepy. Good for nights in.”

“Pretty good strain! I Found this strain to be very mellowing, with a nice head high. However, it also kept me very alert/ “there”. I didn’t feel like an airhead, but felt I was aware of my surroundings and what I was doing, while having 0 thoughts in my head and being content! Definitely a regular!”

“My dad uses medical marijuana for cluster headaches and I had been told it would be a good night time strain so I was really excited for him to try it before bed tonight. Unfortunately, it seems to be having the opposite effect on him. He says he's tired, but he feels talkative and energetic at the same time. But it's a good body high and he's enjoying the buzz, so  I guess that evens it out!”

“Couldn't get a sativa this last pick-up, so I was given this instead. Just reinforces why I don't like indica-dominant strains. While it is relaxing, it burns poorly (or maybe it's just my back-up papers) and leaves me super fogged. It also has zero (or negative) effects on my migraines/headaches. Definitely not a strain for me. Hopefully next paycheck I can grab some more Panama Red. :D”
“Not much into indica cause it makes me too sleepy and feeling heavy. Other than that the small is good. If u love indica u'll love this!”
“great dense buds  nice smoke before bed”
“Taste incredible, so sweet and very strong effect 4/5”

“I was fairly impressed with this little gem. Despite its mediocre pain rating I find it was unusually effective on my body pain. Also a uplifting and positive euphoria. Excellent for stress and depression. But definitely not one of the more powerful and pain relieving indicas.”

“Personally, for me, I literally had a semi- panic/anxiety attack simply melt away recently on a pretty nerve wrecking project that I was working on. Its a regular thing when the heat gets turned upon me that I practically cannot function. Especially on a really highly detailed section.... 
After a bowl of Kish" aka Shishkaberry
column4: a few minutes later and "Goliath" was now mini-mouse!  Yet for me I maintain total facil...”"

column3: “For relax and enjoy ! Good taste , like fruit !”
“This is my go to standard variety. It's got a good gentle start with a nice relaxed and calming high. Great flavor, too.”

“i grew a cut from this strain
its really wild style growing with lots of branches and a high yield.
the aroma its very sweet and fruity reminding from fruits like grapes and peaches to candy
the effect its not very potent but its a nice mellow high”
“Great taste and mellow body high. Very nice stuff :)”
“lovely taste me mm my husband enjoyed it..relieves the stress..”

“Release tension and stress; flow along, leaving your worries behind. I vaped this out of a sample pack with a friend who is also experienced and it blew our minds. Like wow! Grass never makes me giggly, but this did! carefree, uplifting, great for socializing. It's honestly, one of the best strains I've tried.”

“it would be a lot better if it didn't make me eat up everything in my house XD. other tha. that, wonderful strain with a beautiful aroma, but I wouldn't recommend it if you're trying to lose weight because this will make you EAT.”
“Not really into sweet strains but I like this one quite a bit. Nice change from kush. Really balanced mind and body high.”

“One of my favourite strains to order from WhitePalm!! Ordered it a few times already and the quality and flavour is always consistently incredible. Their online service department is always available to answer any questions regarding any of their products and services and have never had any issues with the shipment of products from their location”
“Great for Sleeping”
“nice dense”
“Tastes great but it does make me cough, so caution is advised when vaping.”
“Shishkaberry tastes & smells SO GOOD! So. Good. Really relaxed & heavy--perfect for nighttime. Also mixed this with Blue Dream and it's freaking wonderful.”
“Heavy at first but light heAded. I feel talkative and floaty. Fluffy nugs.”
“It worked well for pain, but I found it spiked my anxiety if I took too much. Not bad but I wouldn't get it again.”
“Very nice. Smooth.”

“Seriously one of the best flowers I've ever encountered! Erases nausea & intense migraines for me better than any over-the-counter drug can and I really appreciated that. Shishkaberry really smells incredible too. It's really sweet and the berry comes across heavily. 

I would recommend this strain to anyone dealing with sinus pressure related migraines and GI related nausea.”
“All time favorite! Powerful berry flavor and potent effects. Nice head high with waves of laziness. I found myself oozing into the couch while I took deep calming breaths of relaxation.”
“I High-ly recomend this;) The taste is just so fruity and the high is awesome (Really good for pain)”

“Nice tasting, definitely recommend using a pipe to get the full flavour. Bud wad covered in Kief and the smell of hash. I like the relaxing, but not overpowering feeling I get off of this strain. Can be smoked during any time of day, but perhaps that's where it's lacking - it doesn't seem to stand up to most of the heavier indicas.”
“Its a sweet, beautiful strain to float away on.”
“hang to your head.....3 2 1 lift off”
“Close to perfection! First, a wonderful taste and aroma, smooth, then a warm euphoric head and then a very nice body effect for 2-3 hours. Totally recommend!”
“awsome, had me JTFO”
“shishkkabeery is xreate good taste great high”
“Surfing through my mind on my bed”
“Great potent indica. Great for pain and insomnia. Nice sweet citrus and berry taste...all into one. Great Bud. A”
“Just picked this up for hella cheap. Wasn't expecting much since I smoke daily but it did the job. Very relaxed straight to the head high. What can I say I loveee indica's!!”

“Buds were a bit dry and brittle from my LP. Looks nice and frosty tho. Smoked nicely with an odd taste. Kind of like Pepto Bismol. Decent solid high with a bit of pain relief and munchies made up for all of that tho.”
“aromatic but harsh. quick hitting bud with a mellow high and soothing body effects.”
“Super awesome medicine (awesome for recreational too), and tastes great when purchased at the super awesome Oregon Green Rush.”

“I vaped it tonight and I cannot sleep. To be true I've never felt sleepiness after this strain. I feel the happiness, q lot of thoughts, and sometimes insomnia. I am really sensitive to the sativa side probably.”
“relaxation was as achieved easily, when I had this strain.”
“omg knock me on my ass!! lol mr n my husband were blowed :)”
“potent sweet tasting got more then I except 5/5”
“smells soo goood”

“Una de las mejores variedades que he probado. Con un aroma muy agradable y dulce, es suave al paladar. Sus efectos son casi instantáneos; Una sensación de alegría y sociabilidad surgen para dar, al cabo de un tiempo, la clásica sensación índica de total y profunda vagancia.”
“one of my favorite strains Good flavor and smell”
“A great flavourful indica that will leave you relaxed for the end of the day.”
“gets rid of my anxiety”
“Tried this in a shatter...couple draws and it's relax time. It's a nice euphoric high that takes away the stress and aches. Extra dry mouth so make sure you have a bevy handy.”
“This strain is amazing for stomach or head pain.”

“Again, found it average, i dont normally like the fruity berry type strains, i dont know the fruity berry strains always remind me of old fruit in paper lunch bags. Didnt burn me out too bad either for an indica. Heavy on the eyes though i found. Woul...”
“Really good Indica, smells fantastic and if you smoke at night it will help you get to sleep and have an amazing night of sleep.”

“love this! one of best I had. there's a reason for it being so popular in Oregon. Tried it in LA and was just not the same. It's sad that more people don't give it a try.

if you fight off the coma it'll put you in then you can become pretty productive. Great for ADHD and being a painkiller. 

to me this strain is the perfect ADHD medicine.”

“Vaporized a quarter of a pinch and It removed all my filters felt like I was fully going to die, I have a disability and it removed my sight and movements completely. Though it smells great it made me fully disabled and statue like lasts a long time!”
“Lazy Shit Yeah”
“This is the first time I bought from a legal dispenser and also hadn't smoked since high school(was getting paranoid too much) So I need up buying swish”
“wonderful, sweet smelling, yummy stuff. Sounds like a candy bar. Shishkaberry didn't make me raid the pantry looking for snack foods either. I WOULD recommend this, It's very good.”

“this strain is amazing.  no paranoid no negative effects 
I love smoking it in my bong with ice cold water. it tastes great nice aftertaste

“Smells cheesy but tastes like blueberry, uplifting, lazy high. A good straight up indica at a good price point.”

“great before bed”
